title: PG vs Hostel: Which is Better for Students in Delhi?
introduction: Choosing between a PG and a hostel is one of the first decisions students face when moving to Delhi. Both have their advantages, but the right choice depends on your budget, lifestyle preferences, and priorities.
verdict: For most students in Delhi, a well-managed PG offers significantly better value. While hostels are cheaper, PGs provide better food, more privacy, superior safety, and a home-like environment.
best_for_a: Students wanting comfort, privacy, good food, and a home-like experience
best_for_b: Budget-conscious students okay with dormitory living
keywords: hostel or PG which is better
PG vs hostel for students Delhi

title: PG vs Flat: Which Should You Choose in Delhi?
introduction: Should you rent a flat or move into a PG? While a flat offers independence, a PG offers convenience. Let's break down the real costs and benefits.
verdict: PGs win on total cost, convenience, and time savings. When you add up rent, groceries, gas, maid, WiFi, electricity, and water, a flat costs 40-60% more than a PG.
best_for_a: Students, young professionals who value convenience
best_for_b: Couples, families, or individuals needing complete independence
keywords: PG or flat which is cheaper

title: PG vs Coliving: What's the Real Difference?
introduction: Coliving is marketed as the modern, premium alternative to PGs. But is it worth the premium price? This comparison finds out.
verdict: PGs win on value. Coliving spaces look great but cost 30-60% more for the same core services. A well-managed PG offers everything coliving does — minus designer aesthetics — at a fraction of the cost.
best_for_a: Budget-conscious students and professionals who prioritise value
best_for_b: Young professionals with higher budgets who value aesthetics

title: Girls PG vs Boys PG: Key Differences & What to Expect
introduction: Girls PGs and boys PGs differ in rules, security, amenities, and pricing. Understanding these differences helps you set expectations.
verdict: Girls PGs offer higher security and cleanliness but come with stricter rules and slightly higher prices. Boys PGs are more relaxed and cheaper. Kangaroo House maintains excellent standards regardless of gender.
best_for_a: Female students and working women who prioritise safety
best_for_b: Male students and working men who want flexible rules
keywords: difference between girls and boys PG
